double_crochet/single_crochet to join 6 sts end of the round 24 sts rnds 7 1 double_crochet/single_crochet in each st around finish off and round 17 chain 1 does not count as first double_crochet/single_crochet weave in ends 24 sts 1dc/decrease in same st as chain 1 and the next st and in each st around until end of round slip_stitch to eyes create two french knots for the eyes using top of first double_crochet/single_crochet to join 3 sts cut thread leav- black yarn bring the thread out at the required ing a long tail position hold the thread down where it emerges with the left thumb and encircle the thread 5 round 18 using your tail end and using your yarn times with the needle still holding the thread needle sew the last 3 stitches together firmly with your thumb twist the needle back to the starting point and insert it close to where the make your scrap of ribbon into a bow and sew to the top of betty s head thread first emerged not in the exact place or it will simply pull back through pull the needle through to the back leaving a knot on the surface nose sew on a button for the nose a covered or shank button will work best but a normal button will work as well round 8 join dark brown yarn to any st 1 cluster © keep calm and crochet on u k 2014 2 stitch guidance slip_stitch slip_stitch insert hook in st indicated yarn over and draw through all loops
